attributes.action: Carry out your statements made before and since you took over the governing of the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Your big buddy Mr. Blair along with yourself and your party stated on numerous occasions that the people who put you where you are today would be able to have their say in the country if something cropped up to justify such.
That such has arrived as you know only too well, a REFERENDUM on the rights to bow out of the European Union completely.
This country never had any problems with human rights until we got involved with the E.U.I wonder for how long this web site will stay open before you decide you are the BOSS and ONLY YOU will decide the future of this country and its people.

You must get the rights back to British Law to deport any and all unwanted individuals

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
